item.title: PARA
item.description: score:14 Chances: Paramount Global (PARAA) has gained strong momentum recently and is still trading at reasonable prices. The company’s iconic consumer brand portfolio includes Paramount+, Pluto TV, CBS, Showtime Networks, Paramount Pictures, Nickelodeon, MTV, Comedy Central and BET, which gives it a strong market presence.
